text: The University of Groningen (Dutch: Rijksuniversiteit Groningen), shortened to UG, is a public university in Groningen, a city in the province of Groningen, the Netherlands. The University of Groningen was established in 1614. It has about 34,000 students. Its focus is on all sorts of sciences. == Other websites == * Category:1614 establishments Category:1610s establishments in Europe Groningen Category:Groningen (city) Category:17th-century establishments in the Netherlands
title: University of Groningen
